Text:
I've had these since 1992 and I don't get to anal about keeping them in mint condition. So even if I wanted to clean them up with some levels adjustments, I think it would look really ugly due to a bit of grubbiness.

However I'm open to suggestions regarding anything, not that I'll respond but I will take comments on board.

I saw in a comment on a Spock upload that this was hard to get so it's nice to be able to give something back to the community. ZZZ

Hey, thank you for this. i'm the Trailer Trash fanatic who requested these amazing comics on LeonardTSpocks torrents. I've picked up a few over the 90's but lost them to water damage...or beer, and ex-girlfriends trashing my belongings...guess i relate to these stories a bit. Anyway, any Thompkins or Charles Burns work is greatly appreciated
